name: Fruity Gardens
description:
Get your spade out and grab your gardening gloves, these fruity gardens need attending! Pick up all kinds of fruits to score the most points before the timer runs out.

- Play through 90 juicy levels full of fun and oversized fruits. 
- Link up multiple fruits of the same kind for maximum points!
- Create a massive chain of fruitiness to unleash the almighty watermelon fruit.
- A colorful experience with delicious graphics and funky music.
